page.title: 10PETS
page.content: We have found out that lots of people in this area have pets. The most popular pets are cats with{15%}and dogs with{14%}followed by goldfish, rabbits and budgies. Special animal food (tinned and packeted) is the most popular food for pets. Next is scraps with{22%}, then specially bought food (liver and meat) with{15%}. Many people thought this was a good area for keeping dogs in although{47%}thought it wasn't. Most pets sleep inside with only{5%}living in hutches and{1%}in the garden.{66% said their pets do not do tricks, but a{quarter}did do tricks. Not all dogs are pets,{8%}of dogs are sheepdogs,{5% are guard dogs and{3%}are guide dogs. Many pets had illnesses, worms, eye infections, flu and tumors in the ear being the most common.
